meaningMnemonic: If 染める is "to dye," then this is <vocabulary>to be dyed</vocabulary>. You aren't doing the dying, because you know that if you did it you would have done things right, unlike the other person who dyed your hair. This person <reading>marr</reading>ed (まる) it up really bad.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as 染める.
